Package org.netbeans.api.javahelp

NetBeans JavaHelp integration API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Help
    An implementation of the JavaHelp system.
    HelpUtils
    Utility methods for helpsets.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HelpSetRegistration
    Registers a help set.

Package org.netbeans.api.javahelp Description

NetBeans JavaHelp integration API. Used to add help to a module or display help.

  1. Help, the only public class.

  2. Reference documentation

  3. Help Guide (friendlier)

  4. JavaHelp Standard Extension
